name: The Ancient Tomes(Text Based Version)
description:
Hello everyone this is the text based version of "The ancient tomes" a 2.5 D game i'm developing.
I plan to focus on the story and game design now  so i decided to make the text based version first.

The game is under developing but you can finish the first scene.

Size of the game is fairly small(50 KB) so feel free to download the game and enjoy!

guide:

Beside the inputs that each scenario brings to you you can use these as well:

menu

stats

inventory

We really appreciate your feeback

If you have any interesting scenarios we'll be glad to add it to the game!

If you want to help us join our discord!

https://discord.gg/zvWnYfVJnq
